content: - just to be safe * ### gauge 32 sts x 30 row = 4 x 4 10cm x 10cm in lace pattern ### skills required - knitting flat - long-tail cast on - icelandic bind-off optional tutorial 3 - basic lace ### stitches used - yo yarn over - sk2p - k3tog - k2tog - ssk > donʼt forget to share on instagram using hashtag #goodthingsshawl so i can see > **financial accessibility ** if you are unable to pay the full price for this pattern you can use coupon code **good4u** at checkout to receive $4 off the pattern price if this is still not financially viable please feel free to reach out and i m happy to provide the pattern at no cost no questions asked ☺️ 1 https //ko-fi com/yarnandsarcasm 2 https //youtu be/x8xbascgits 3 https //www 10rowsaday com/icelandic-bindoff
